nodes.text: Hika Ten was a female human bounty hunter who operated in the Anoat sector during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Ten had been hunting bounties since the age of fifteen, and preferred to use exotic explosives.
During the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, she joined the crew of the Smuggler, who dispatched her on a variety of missions throughout the Anoat sector.
Hika Ten was created for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon mobile game developed by Kabam, Disney Interactive, and Lucasfilm for iOS and Android platforms. The game was released on September 10, 2015.
